name: MoggleVsSpriggan
description: Thanalan is a zone in Eorzea in where have very rich mineral resources. People mining too much and more and more deep, and they disturb the spriggans who are living in the very deep side of the mine hole. The Frightened spriggans begin to mirage to the Black Shroud, and they met the moogles who are living in the Black Shroud...
